name: Mirchi Bada
history: Mirchi Bada is a traditional snack from Rajasthan, India. It's a popular street food known for its spicy and savory flavors, typically made with large green chili peppers stuffed with spiced potato filling.
description: Mirchi Bada consists of large green chilies stuffed with a spicy potato mixture, coated in gram flour batter, and deep-fried until golden. It's crispy on the outside, with a soft and flavorful interior.

equipment.name: mixing bowl
equipment.description: For preparing the batter and filling.

instructions.title: Prepare the Filling
instructions.description: Mix the mashed potatoes with cumin seeds, red chili powder, turmeric powder, asafoetida, chopped coriander leaves, and salt. Slit the green chilies and stuff them with this potato mixture.

instructions.title: Make the Batter
instructions.description: In a bowl, mix gram flour with water, a pinch of salt, and a little red chili powder to form a smooth batter.

instructions.title: Fry the Mirchi Badas
instructions.description: Heat oil in a frying pan. Dip the stuffed chilies in the batter, ensuring they are well coated, and deep fry them until golden and crisp.

instructions.title: Serve
instructions.description: Drain the Mirchi Badas on paper towels to remove excess oil. Serve hot with chutney or ketchup.

tips: Choose large chilies that are not very spicy for a balanced flavor.
The batter should be neither too thick nor too thin to coat the chilies well.
variations: Add finely chopped onions or grated cheese to the potato filling for a different taste.
Experiment with different types of chilies for varying levels of heat.

storage.shelfLife: Best consumed fresh. Not recommended for extended storage.
storage.instructions: If needed, store in an airtight container in the refrigerator and reheat in an oven or air fryer for best results.

reheatingInstructions: Reheat in an oven or air fryer until crisp.
presentationTips: Serve on a platter with a side of mint or tamarind chutney.
Garnish with fresh coriander leaves or slices of lime for added freshness.
